articles.title: Meeting of Activists in Fisheries of KPA Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Activists in Fisheries of KPA Held
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting of activists in fisheries of the Korean People's Army (KPA) took place in Pyongyang Thursday.
					 The meeting, the first of its kind in the KPA history, was attended by Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Jong Nam and other officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, generals and other officers of the KPA, officials in the field of fisheries of the KPA and fishermen and captains who set an example in fishing this year.
					
					 So Hong Chan, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, made a report which was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said the path covered by the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK is associated with patriotic devotion and deep loving care shown by the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu for soldiers.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 In the early period of building the modern and regular armed forces after the liberation of Korea, President Kim Il Sung organized sideline work-teams of fishermen in the People's Army and clearly indicated the way and tasks for conducting sideline fishing in each period and at each stage of the developing revolution, performing undying feats for the development of fisheries till the last moments of his life.
					
					 With noble outlook on soldiers, leader Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul to make sure that a lot of fish is supplied to soldiers.
					
					 Despite the grim trials during the Arduous March he saw to it that a great number of fish breeding farms and catfish farms were built, and sent baggage boats and fishing tackles to units and sub-units situated along the seashores, thus making it possible to provide soldiers with fish all the year round.
					
					 Whenever he visited units and sub-units of the People's Army, he dropped in at mess halls and was greatly satisfied to see soldiers having food including fish.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un assigned to the People's Army the task to conduct sideline fishing and supply soldiers with more fish, and wisely led the drive for carrying it out, adding:
					
					 He also took measures to kindle a new torch of catching fish and saw to it that a socialist emulation drive was waged, thus making the whole army alive with fish catching.
					
					 Under his leadership a solid foundation was laid for actively conducting sideline fishing. He also sent all-purpose fishing boats having modern fishing equipment and tackles to make big fish hauls every day.
					
					 The reporter and speakers referred to the achievements and experience gained in the practical efforts for upholding the intention of the supreme commander on injecting fresh vitality into sideline fishing.
					
					 They stressed the need for officials in the field of fisheries and fishermen to work hard to bring about big hauls of fish next year, too, under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 An appeal to all the officials in the field of fisheries and fishermen of the army was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 The appeal ardently called on them to become pioneers and shock forces in materializing the far-reaching plan of the supreme commander for supplying large quantities of fish to all defence posts of the country and reenergizing the fishing industry of the country.

articles.title: New Year Card from Xi Jinping
articles.content:
New Year Card from Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a New Year card from Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and president of the People's Republic of China on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 103 (2014).
					The New Year card was conveyed to an official concerned by Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, on Thursday.
					
					Kim Jong Un also received New Year cards from Li Yuanchao, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the CPC and vice-president of the PRC, and Wang Jiarui, vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference and head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the CPC.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Letter from Economic Councilors Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Letter from Economic Councilors Corps
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the economic and commercial councilors corps here on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 103 (2014).
					 They were handed to an official concerned by Pavel Reshakov, councilor of the Russian Embassy here who is doyen of the corps, on Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Letter from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Letter from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the second anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 They were handed to Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Hassan Reza Husseini, military attache of the Iranian Embassy here who is doyen of the corps, on Thursday.

articles.title: Anniversary of Assumption of Supreme Commandership Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Assumption of Supreme Commandership Observed
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Social organizations held celebrations Thursday on the occasion of the second anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 The reporters and speakers said holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as supreme commander of the KPA marked a noteworthy event as it provided a sure guarantee for successfully carrying forward the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche and represented the greatest fortune and honor for all service personnel and people of the DPRK. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un has carried forward Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's idea and theory of army building, ushering in a great heyday of bolstering up the revolutionary armed forces with his brilliant wisdom and rare commanding art, they said, adding:
					
					 Thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Un, the Generalissimos' idea of army building and feats performed in it are shining with brilliance and the sacred Songun revolutionary history of Kim Jong Il is given steady continuity on this land.
					
					 Under the leadership of Kim Jong Un who has defended the country, revolution and socialism with his matchless pluck, the army and the people of the DPRK have achieved one victory after another in confrontation with the U.S. and stepped up the building of a thriving nation.
					
					  They underscored the need to wage more dynamic general advance for building an economic power and improving the people's living standard by embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism and wage a positive drive to build the best country and a highly civilized socialist power on this land, true to the grand plan of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They called upon all of them to get united closer around Kim Jong Un and contribute to successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche, Songun revolutionary cause started in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Present there were Ri Yong Su, department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of working people's organizations, officials concerned, workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, youth and students, agricultural workers and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Osandok Prize Closes
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Osandok Prize Closes
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Sports contest for Osandok Prize closed with due ceremony at the Ice Rink on Thursday. It was opened on Dec. 3 to mark the 96th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Men of the Pyongyang Railway Bureau Sports Team and women of the Taesongsan Sports Team came first in the ice-hockey event respectively.
					
					 The players of Taesongsan Sports Team placed first in figure-skating in team standing while the men of Hwaebul Sports Team and women of Jangsan Sports Team in short-track speed skating in team standing.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were officials concerned and sports persons.
					
					 Cups and medals were awarded to the successful teams and players.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Publishes Many Famous Works
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Publishes Many Famous Works
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un authored works with his outstanding wisdom and through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities while steering the advance in the new century of Juche. He thus provided a signpost for winning a final victory. 
					 In a treatise published on the occasion of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung he expounded the idea that a century-long history of Juche Korea is the most sacred and glorious one shining with the august names and revolutionary exploits of the President and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 In the works published in December when the whole county deeply grieved over the demise of Kim Jong Il Kim Jong Un set forth the idea on overcoming the sorrow of all service personnel and people with redoubled courage and carrying through his behests without any deflection or compromise.
					
					 He sent a message of thanks to all service personnel of the Korean People's Army and people who displayed intense loyalty in devotedly implementing their behests during the 100-day period of mourning the demise of Kim Jong Il. In the message Kim Jong Un expressed the will to spruce up in a more solemn manner the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state and devote himself to the socialist country and its people. 
					
					 In his speech delivered in the military parade on the occasion of the centenary of birth of the President, Kim Jong Un clarified that single-minded unity, invincible military power and industrial revolution in the new century precisely mean a socialist thriving nation and gave the order to make a general advance "Forward to the final victory!".
					
					 In his New Year address Kim Jong Un put up the slogan for this year marking the 65th anniversary of the foundation of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and set forth a strategy to glorify this year as a year of creation and great changes. 
					
					 He set forth tasks for kicking off a grand onward movement for improving the people's living standard at the national meeting of light industrial workers held in March. 
					
					 He published the historic appeal "Let us usher in a fresh heyday on all the fronts of socialist construction by creating the 'speed on Masik Pass'" making sure that fresh miracles and merits were brought about  in all work sites for a great surge. 
					
					 In his works Kim Jong Un stressed the need to surpass the world level by accelerating campaign of brains, campaign of intelligence, and demonstrate the honor of the country and the resourcefulness of the nation before the whole world. 
					
					 He sent a letter to teachers and students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School on their 65th anniversaries and delivered a congratulatory speech at the joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union organizations for celebrating the 66th anniversary of the KCU. His letter and speech reflect his noble wishes to see the younger generation, successors to revolution, stoutly grow up to be masters in the future.

articles.title: DPRK Witnesses Progress in Light Industry This Year
articles.content:
DPRK Witnesses Progress in Light Industry This Year
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has made strides in consolidating the material and technical foundations for the light industry this year, increasing the production of consumer goods.
					 The Hamhung Knitwear Factory was equipped with up-to-date facilities while a velvet shop appeared at the Pakchon Silk Mill and process of yarn for knitwear at Hamhung Woolen Mill and some of the production processes were renovated at the Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory.
					
					 The Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory put on the basis of the latest techniques all its production processes, including processes for refined oil, Vitamin-E and lecithin.
					
					 Meanwhile, production has been on steady increase at light industrial factories even under the difficult conditions caused by the imperialists' persistent sanctions.
					
					 The Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, Kanggye Knitwear Factory, Pyongyang Hosiery Factory, Hamhung Silk Mill and many other economic units have overfulfilled their yearly quotas on all indices.
					
					 Cocoon production companies throughout the country turned out 200 more tonnes of silkworm cocoons than last year.
					
					 The Pyongyang Wheat Flour Processing Factory, Sonhung Foodstuff Factory, Sinuiju Cosmetics Factory and other factories under the Ministry of Food and Consumer Goods Industries swelled their production through a drive for new inventions and emulation for increased output.
					
					 Also, a work for updating production processes has been conducted at local industrial factories in Changsong, Yonthan, Usi and other counties. Those factories mass-produced popular consumer goods by making an effective use of locally available raw materials.
					
					 This year witnessed an increase of 10,000 more August 3 consumer goods production units across the country than last year's as well as invention of many new products.
					
					 Such exhibitions and shows were held as the National Exhibition of Consumer Goods, the 3rd Commodity Show and the National Exhibition of 206 Sundry Goods so as to encourage producers to turn out popular quality goods in a larger quantity.
					
					 The signal progress made in the country's light industry this year is attributable to the energetic guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un. He in his New Year address defined the light industry as the main thrust of the economic construction and indicated the tasks and ways for developing it at the national meeting of light industrial workers held in March.
					
					 The light industrial officials and workers are now striving to make greater progress in the efforts for bettering the people's living conditions as intended by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK recently issued 6 new stamps (individual).
					 Among them is a stamp on the theme of "2013 International Year of Water Cooperation" with pictures calling for providing people with clean water.
					
					 Other stamps carry famous national paintings featuring "hawk", "tiger", "carp", "eagle" and "cat", masterpieces of old-time Korean artists.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Moves to Privatize Railway Service Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Moves to Privatize Railway Service Slammed
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Internet paper Jaju Minbo on Dec. 23 in a commentary denounced the puppet regime for its moves to privatize railway service.
					 The commentary said:
					
					 The strike of the railway workers is a righteous struggle to prevent the authorities' privatization of railway service. 
					
					 The regime is cracking down on the actions of the people from all walks of life including opposition parties and workers against privatization, attempting to conceal its policy of privatization.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is raising a hue and cry over the observance of law and principle as regards the strike of the Railway Trade Union, but this is to suppress the people opposed to the policy of the authorities.
					
					 The issue regarding the policy of privatizing the railway service can be solved only when the present regime steps down, the commentary stressed.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Crackdown on Progressive Organization under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Crackdown on Progressive Organization under Fire
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea issued a statement on Monday denouncing the south Korean puppet regime for its illegal crackdown on the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions.
					 The statement recalled that policemen broke into office rooms of the confederation, destroying windows and furniture and threatening and walking off workers at random on December 22 even though the search-warrant was rejected.
					
					 The regime acted against law, though it had blamed someone for "illegality", it criticized, and went on:
					
					 Park Geun Hye disclosed her ulterior intention to persist in cracking down on the trade unions. This is defiance and challenge to the popular mind-set.
					
					 It urged the Park's "government" to apologize for the repressive racket, punish the chief culprit and halt the privatization.
					
					 The statement declared that the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea would positively support the workers' strike for checking the privatization of railway service and invariably stage solidarity actions for them.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Intensify Actions Demanding Resignation of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Intensify Actions Demanding Resignation of Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Overseas Koreans staged widespread actions in different parts of the world in protest against the fraudulent election of Park Geun Hye and in demand of her resignation. 
					 On Dec. 20 Koreans in France held a meeting in Paris in demand of the resignation of Park.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Koreans of academic circles and religious organizations and French people. 
					
					 Speakers at the meeting accused Park Geun Hye of pursuing policies for herself only after coming to power by frauds. 
					
					 Calling for achieving justice at the cost of lives, they strongly demanded an investigation into the fraudulent election and re-election in south Korea. 
					
					 Koreans in Germany staged an action in Berlin on the same day demanding the chief executive of south Korea to step down. 
					
					 Next day Koreans in Canada and U.K. held meetings in Toronto and London. Chanting slogans urging Park to resign, the participants bitterly denounced the unfair election and expressed the will to intensify the struggle for democracy in south Korea. 
					
					 Koreans in the U.S. staged a candlelight demonstration in Philadelphia on Dec. 22. They demanded Park Geun Hye step down for democracy in south Korea. A similar action took place in Washington on the same day. 
					
					 On Dec. 19 Koreans in Los Angeles waged a demo chanting such slogans as "Let us struggle till Park Geun Hye resigns!" and "Let us disband Intelligence Service!".
					
					 The "Association of south Koreans in Japan for Democracy and Unification" conducted agitation actions in protest against the unfair election held in south Korea and in demand of resignation of Park Geun Hye regime in Tokyo, Osaka and other parts of Japan on Dec. 19.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Show Held in Dalian, China
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Show Held in Dalian, China
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- A Kimjongilia show took place in Dalian, China on Dec. 19 on the occasions of the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il, the 22nd anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 96th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The venue of the show presented fantastic scenery as potted Kimjongilias were displayed against the background of a large fine art piece depicting Mt. Paektu and the star of Generalissimo. On display there were photos introducing diplomas and medals awarded to the flower at international festivals.
					
					 Present at its opening ceremony were officials concerned in Dalian City and masses.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK consul-general in Shenyang and staff members of the consulate-general and others.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Czech Republic, Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Czech Republic, Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place in the Czech Republic and a film show in Ethiopia on Dec. 16 and 18 on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il performed distinguished feats for socialist construction and the human cause of independence while leading the Korean revolution for a long period.
					
					 He developed in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung as required by the times and the developing revolution, foiled the imperialist allied forces' moves to stifle the DPRK and defended Korean-style socialism by pursuing the Songun politics.
					
					 It was thanks to the Songun politics that peace and security have been firmly ensured on the Korean Peninsula, the region and the rest of the world.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of all people for the greatness of his idea and leadership, his ardent love for the people and his exploits.
					
					 A new heyday of the building of a thriving socialist nation is ushered in the DPRK under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chief designer of a metal and machine general company of Ethiopia said after watching the Korean film "Arms of Korea":
					
					 Kim Jong Il firmly protected the sovereignty and dignity of the country and turned the DPRK into a nuclear weapons state and satellite manufacturer and launcher with his Songun politics.
					
					 I realized that his wise leadership helped turn the DPRK into an invincible military power.

articles.title: Russians Laud Kim Jong Il's Feats
articles.content:
Russians Laud Kim Jong Il's Feats
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Russian organizations made public statements on Dec. 17 on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Group for Solidarity with the DPRK said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il passed away, but his exploits are always remembered by us.
					
					 One of his greatest feats was that he successfully solved the issue of succession to the revolutionary cause.
					
					 He was a model of great leader and teacher of world revolutionaries as he dedicated his all to the prosperity of the country.
					
					 I wish the Workers' Party of Korea and the army and people of the DPRK signal progress under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Dagestan Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy noted:
					
					 We, Juche idea followers and friends of the Korean people, commemorate the second anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il with great sorrow.
					
					 He devotedly served the country and its people.
					
					 He was the great leader of the Korean people and elder statesman in the world.
					
					 The undying revolutionary exploits he performed for the human cause of independence will shine forever.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The British branch of the Korean Friendship Association released a statement on Dec. 11 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 It said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il dedicated his all to the people's happiness till the last moments of his life.
					
					 Under his outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership the DPRK resolutely frustrated the U.S. imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK and firmly defended the dignity and sovereignty of the nation.
					
					 The DPRK turned into an independent military power.
					
					 Kim Jong Il ushered in the June 15 era of reunification to open a bright prospect for pulling down the barrier of division and achieving national reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					
					 He was a great leader of the Korean people as well as the world progressives.
					
					 It expressed belief that the revolutionary cause of Juche, Songun revolutionary cause would successfully be accomplished under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un, great successor to Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Abierta conferencia de activistas de la rama pesquera del EPC
articles.content:
Abierta conferencia de activistas de la rama pesquera del EPC
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 26 en esta capital la conferencia de activistas de la rama pesquera del Ejercito Popular de Corea por primera vez desde la fundacion de este cuerpo armado.
					 En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Jong Nam y otros funcionarios del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, los generales y oficiales del EPC, los funcionarios de la rama pesquera del EPC, los pescadores y capitanes de barcos ejemplares en la pesca de este ano.
					
					 En la ocasion hubo el informe de So Hong Chan, primer viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, y las intervenciones.
					
					 Los oradores dijeron que en la trayectoria de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Corea estan registradas las huellas de abnegacion patriotica y amor de los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu a los soldados.
					
					 Recordaron que el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung organizo el equipo pesquero de autoconsumo en el EPC ya en el periodo inicial de construccion de las fuerzas regulares modernas despues de la liberacion del pais y aclaro la direccion y los remedios de esa faena en cada periodo y etapa de la revolucion.
					
					  Prosiguieron que acumulo hasta el ultimo momento de su vida inmortales hazanas para desarrollar la industria pesquera.
					
					 Apuntaron que partiendo de su noble concepcion de los soldados, el Generalisimo Kim Jong Il realizo ingentes esfuerzos fisicos y mentales por alimentar muchos pescados a los militares.
					
					  A pesar de las duras pruebas del periodo de la Marcha penosa, hizo construir numerosos criaderos de peces y fabricas de siluro y envio canoas e instrumentos de pesca a las unidades y subunidades acampadas en zonas litorales, de modo que los militares consuman muchos pescados, recordaron.
					
					  Anadieron que cada vez que visitaba las unidades y subunidades del EPC, el se ponia mas contento cuando veia a los soldados comiendo pescados.
					
					El Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un  presento la tarea de suministrar mayor cantidad de pescados a los militares impulsando en el ejercito popular la pesca de autoabastecimiento y dirigio sabiamente la lucha por cumplirla, recalcaron.
					
					Continuaron que el tomo las medidas para registrar nuevos saltos en la pesca e hizo desplegar en todo el ejercito la emulacion socialista por capturar mas peces.
					
					Preparo la firme base para activar la pesca de autoconsumo y envio a las empresas pesqueras los instrumentos y los barcos modernos que regresan ahora a sus puertos repletos de pescados, dijeron.
					
					Los oradores se refirieron a los exitos y experiencias logrados en la campana para materializar el proposito del Comandante Supremo de activar la pesca de autoabastecimiento.
					
					Exhortaron a todos los funcionarios de la rama y pescadores a trabajar intensamente en el proximo ano para capturar abundantes peces bajo la direccion del Mariscal.
					
					En la reunion fue aprobado el llamamiento enviado a los funcionarios del sector y los pescadores de todo el ejercito.
					
					La nota les exhorto a ser vanguardias en apoyar el gran proposito del Comandante Supremo de enviar mucho mas peces a todos los puestos militares y activar la industria pesquera del pais.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta de Ano Nuevo de Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta de Ano Nuevo de Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio una carta de felicitacion del Ano Nuevo que con motivo del 103 (2014) de la Era Juche le enviara el Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China Xi Jinping.
					El embajador chino en Corea Liu Hongcai la entrego el dia 26 a un funcionario coreano.
					
					Por otra parte, lo hicieron tambien el miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PCCh y vicepresidente de la RPCh, Li Yuanchao, y el jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh y vicepresidente del Comite Nacional de la Conferencia Consultiva Politica del Pueblo Chino, Wang Jiarui.

articles.title: Entidades de masas organizan actos de elogio a Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Entidades de masas organizan actos de elogio a Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 26 los actos de los obreros, miembros de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea, jovenes y estudiantes, trabajadores agricolas e integrantes de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea por el 2o aniversario del nombramiento del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Los oradores senalaron que este acontecimiento sirve de garantia fundamental para llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria de Songun del Juche y de gran fortuna y gloria del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					Subrayaron que con su extraordinaria perspicacia y arte de mando militar el Mariscal continua la idea y la teoria de los Generalisimos en materia de la construccion del ejercito y abre la era dorada para el  fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					Destacaron que gracias al Mariscal brilla la idea de los Generalisimos en esta materia y sus hazanas y transcurre la sagrada historia de la revolucion de Songun del Dirigente.
					
					Anadieron que bajo la direccion del Mariscal quien defiende con la audacia e impetu la patria, la revolucion y el socialismo, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea logran victoria tras victoria en el enfrentamiento antiyanqui y aceleran la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					Enfatizaron que todos los habitantes deben desplegar la ofensiva general de hoy por la construccion de la potencia economica y la mejora de vida del pueblo materializando el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il y librar la lucha por construir sobre esta tierra la potencia civilizada socialista en pleno acato al gran proposito del Mariscal.
					
					Ademas, deben unirse compactamente en torno al Mariscal y contribuir a heredar con brillantez la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la de Songun iniciada en el monte Paektu.
					
					En los actos participaron el jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea Ri Yong Su, los funcionarios de las entidades de masas e interesados, obreros, miembros de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea, jovenes y ninos escolares, trabajadores agricolas y miembros de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea.

articles.title: Editados nuevos sellos
articles.content:
Editados nuevos sellos
Pyongyang, 26 de diciembre (ACNC) -- La Direccion Estatal de Sellos de Corea dio a luz un sello individual dedicado al ano internacional de cooperacion de agua 2013 y otros cinco individuales que reflejan los notables dibujos.
					En la parte superior del primero estan  inscritas las letras "Ano internacional de  cooperacion de agua 2013". El sello inserta los dibujos de suministrar a las personas el agua limpia y asegurarles una condicion de vida cultural e higienica.
					
					En los otros se ven "Halcon", "Tigre" y "Carpa" y otras obras dibujadas por los pintores del tiempo pasado quienes contribuyeron al desarrollo de pinturas al estilo coreano.
